metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4454 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: openCryptoki before 2.4.1, when using spinlocks, allows local users tocreate or set world-writable permissions on arbitrary files via a symlinkattack on the (1) .pkapi_xpk or (2) .pkcs11spinloc file in /tmp.

criterions.comment: opencryptoki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
